img: max-width: 100%; padding: 5px; display: block; margin: auto;
table: margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; border: none; width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; font-size: 16px; table-layout: fixed;
tr: text-align: right; vertical-align: middle; padding: 0.5em 0.5em; line-height: normal; white-space: normal; max-width: none; border: none;
th: text-align: right; vertical-align: middle; padding: 0.5em 0.5em; line-height: normal; white-space: normal; max-width: none; border: none;font-weight: bold;
td: text-align: right; vertical-align: middle; padding: 0.5em 0.5em; line-height: normal; white-space: normal; max-width: none; border: none;
